page.title: 20HOLTON AREA GENERAL VIEW
page.content:
The general impression given to casual visitors of this part of Lincolnshire is of a flattish, sparsely populated, peaceful agricultural countyside. However on closer inspection there is much of interest to be found that is not initially apparent. The pace of life may at times be slower than in urban areas but there is a great deal to attract people to this rural area.
The information for these pages was compiled by Members of Holton Beckering and District Womens' Instiute and their families. We are very grateful to all those who have taken part in any way and for the enthusiasm shown for the project by a wide range of people in the area.
